item.title: Getting Started with WebAssembly and Rust
item.description: An overview on WebAssembly for building and running Rust programs targeting web browsers

item.title: Cross Compiling Rust for the Raspberry Pi
item.description: Use a faster computer to compile a Rust programs and then send that binary over the network to run it on a Raspberry Pi
